# Project Instructions

- NEVER provide summaries.
- DON'T verify the build to ensure there are no errors. Use get_errors instead.
- If you encounter any issues or need further assistance, refer to the official documentation for React, Tailwind CSS, 
and daisyUI for troubleshooting and additional features.
- Read and follow guidelines from `daisy.txt` for daisyUI components
- Read and follow guidelines from `tailwind.txt` for Tailwind CSS
- The requirements of the product can be found in `project-requirements.md`
- The `swagger.json` file contains API specifications for the backend services to be integrated
- There is no need to provide summary or delivery notes unless specifically requested
